div.pre: 2357 Lattes (anc. Latera), near Montpellier, 1965 Burial: end of 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 2000 AR. From excavations Massalia: ob. Disposition: Paris (1/3); Montpellier (1/3) â€ Majurel, et al., Ogam 1966, pp. 275-88, illus. (1890 specimens); 1967, p. 397 (c. 100 more specimens)
